conversation_history.question: testing
conversation_history.answer:
Sure, I can help you with that! Based on the provided excerpts from company AMD's 2022 report, here's my answer to your question:

Question: "testing"

Based on the information presented in Company AMD's 2022 report (10K), the company has a testing process in place to determine the likelihood of an impairment. This includes qualitative testing to determine if it is more likely than not that the fair value of a reporting unit exceeds its carrying amount (page 34). The company also performs quantitative testing, such as comparing the quantities and carrying value of on-hand inventories to related unit sales, to assess the reasonableness of management's key assumptions and judgments (page 35). Additionally, the company tests the accuracy and completeness of the underlying data used to determine the amount of inventory carrying value adjustments (page 35).

Sources:

* Company AMD. (2022). Form 10-K. [online] Sec.gov. Available at <https://www.sec.gov/Archives/content/0001888497-22-000032.pdf>
* Page numbers: 34, 35.

conversation_history.question: company's net income in 2022
conversation_history.answer:
Sure! Based on the information provided in the excerpts from AMD's 2022 10-K report, the company's net income in 2022 was $1.3 billion.

Source: AMD, 2022 10-K report, page 37.

This information can be found in the section titled "Consolidated Statements of Income (Loss)" under the subheading "Net income (loss)".
